Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory46.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nikola', 3: 'You granted the Gray Raven Commandant access to False Words?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: 'Right. Instead of leaving them to collect dust in the archives, why not show them to someone who has the potential to accomplish the goal?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: "It's also a good way to practice.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nikola', 3: 'But why now?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: 'I have a feeling that a difficult battle is on the horizon.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: 'We should first enhance the abilities of our ace warrior.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: 'Also, being fixated with unit division is detrimental to the big scheme.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nikola', 3: 'You do know that there are more than targets to be purified in the KI.GAL Archives, right?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: "I know what I'm doing.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: 'Plus, this type of practice is critical.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nikola', 3: '...In that case, I trust your judgment.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: 'For reclaiming Earth.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nikola', 3: 'Yes, for reclaiming Earth.', 4: '2'}
{3: 'After this, Nikola turns around and walks out of the bridge.'}
{2: 'Nikola', 3: 'I need to borrow a few Purifying Force members.'}
{2: 'Nikola', 3: "I know what I'm doing."}
{3: 'Hassen nods a little after a few seconds, maintaining his usual pose and gaze into the blue planet.'}
